message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you, even more so than that price point.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $15,000 is a bit outside of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  Let me know if that works for you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $13,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,000.  This is my final offer.
